Title.evidence: This systematic review aimed to evaluate whether dexmedetomidine could prevent POD in patients undergoing cardiac surgery.

Intervention.evidence: Dexmedetomidine was more effective in preventing POD compared with both positive control and placebo control.

Objective.evidence: This systematic review aimed to evaluate whether dexmedetomidine could prevent POD in patients undergoing cardiac surgery.

Method_Outcome.evidence: The primary outcome was the incidence of POD.

Number_Randomised.evidence: Thirty-two studies with 6046 participants were included.

Result_Outcome.evidence: Dexmedetomidine notably reduced the incidence of POD (RR = 0.67, 95% CI 0.59–0.76, P < 0.00001).
